overview: Kerim Savaş, who married the daughter of one of the richest people in Turkey, is found dead in his house shortly after the wedding. After the investigation, it is understood that the new groom was killed. Although the police have a large list of suspects, there is not the slightest evidence of the crime, while the special unit cops are having a hard time getting out of the business, and a second murder is committed.
title: Circle: Until the Death Tear Us Apart
